error-boundary.session-expired: Your session has expired. You must log in to the service again or use the service without logging in.
error-boundary.title: An error occurred
error-boundary.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. This may be due to a loss of network connection or a service error.

external-link: The link leads outside the service

feedback.error: Failed to send feedback. Please try again later.

footer-handled.ohjaajan: Guidance practitioners section at the KEHA centre,
footer-handled.osaamispolkuni: My Competency Path at the Finnish National Agency for Education,
footer-handled.tietopalvelu: Information service, entire service and other feedback at the Ministry of Education and Culture.

feedback.footer-info-1: When you send feedback, we save the service status information, such as the view from which the feedback was sent. Status information will not be disclosed to third parties. Feedback is used for service development and voluntarily provided contact information is used to respond to feedback.
feedback.footer-info-heading: Depending on the section, the feedback is processed as follows:
feedback.footer-privacy-heading: Read more in the privacy statements of the feedback processors:
feedback.intro-1: Please provide feedback on the service or report a technical problem. This way, you will help us in service development.
feedback.intro-2: If you report an incident, it would help us if you were as specific as possible.
feedback.intro-privacy: Do not enter any personal information, such as personal identity number or health information, in the feedback. Please fill in all the fields so that we can process your feedback.

links.keha: KEHA Centre's customer and advisory services privacy statement
links.okm: Ministry of Education and Culture's privacy statement
links.oph: Finnish National Agency for Education’s data protection policy

feedback.section-question: Which section does your feedback concern?
feedback.success: Thank you for your feedback! Your feedback will help us to improve the service.
feedback.title: Give feedback
feedback.type-question: What kind of feedback would you like to give?

footer.cooperation-title: The Competency Path has been implemented in cooperation by the following parties
footer.feedback-content: We want to develop Competency Path to better meet your specific needs. Give us feedback and we will take it into account in our development work.
footer.feedback-title: Tell us what you thought about the service!
footer.funding-title: The project is funded by the EU's Recovery and Resilience Facility (RRF).

logos.tem-label: Ministry of Economic Affairs and Employment

footer.more-info-description: Are you worried about data protection or the use of artificial intelligence in the service? Below, you will find a summary of general information about the service and its use.

more-info-links.ai-usage: About the use of artificial intelligence

footer.more-info-title: Do you want to know more about Competency Path?

no-match.description: The page you are looking for could not be found or the link has expired. Check the address, open the menu or go to the front page.
no-match.title: Oops! Page could not be found
